title: Soil Testing & Analysis
shortDescription: Healthy soil is the foundation of every successful farm.
fullDescription: We provide comprehensive soil testing and nutrient analysis to determine the exact macro and micro nutrient levels of your land. Based on your soil report, our experts identify which crops are best suited for your field and design a custom fertilizer recommendation plan to achieve optimum yield.
features: Macro & Micro nutrient analysis (NPK, Zinc, Boron, Sulphur, etc.)
pH, EC, and Organic Carbon evaluation
Fertilizer recommendation reports based on soil health and crop needs
Crop selection guidance according to soil suitability

title: Water Analysis
shortDescription: Water quality plays a crucial role in plant growth and soil health.
fullDescription: We conduct detailed water quality testing to assess physical, chemical, and biological parameters. Based on the results, our experts provide recommendations to improve water usability and crop performance.
features: Testing of parameters like pH, EC, TDS, bicarbonates, chlorides, calcium, magnesium, sodium, etc.
Evaluation of irrigation water quality for different crops
Guidance on water management and filtration systems
Corrective measures for saline or alkaline water

features: Vastu-compliant designs for harmony and aesthetics

We design and develop modern kitchen vegetable net houses that make year-round organic cultivation easy and efficient. Our consultancy provides complete support for organic vegetable production, including irrigation management, pest and disease control, and sustainable organic practices.
 With our expert guidance, you can enjoy fresh, chemical-free vegetables every season — grown naturally, right from your own space.

Yearly crop management schedule from sowing to harvesting
